fields.name: The Rock Creek Group
fields.description: Rock Creek is a leading global investment firm that applies cutting-edge technology and innovation to investments. We strive to generate returns and be at the forefront of change through public and private market investments in developed, emerging and frontier markets. Rock Creek's data-driven technology and innovative culture allow them to capitalize on trends that are reshaping the investment landscape.

fields.name: The Atlantic
fields.description: For more than 150 years, The Atlantic has shaped the national debate on politics, business, foreign affairs, and cultural trends.

fields.name: Saracen Energy
fields.description: Saracen is engaged in physical and financial trading in the North American energy commodity markets. They execute diversified strategies in multiple energy markets through the application of rigorous quantitative analysis to optimize performance across its diversified energy portfolio.
